member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Platforms.AutofacResolver
member.summary: Each configuration needs to register concrete types (e.g. graphics). All types derived from Runner or Presenter are automatically run in AppRunner.

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Platforms.AutofacStarter
member.summary: Starts an application on demand by registering, resolving and running it

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Platforms.Orientation
member.summary: Indicates the current orientation of a screen

member.name: T:DeltaEngine.Platforms.Window
member.summary: Window form the application is running in. In Windows this is done with Windows Forms or WPF.
